title: [Health] Dairy products linked to increased risk of cancer. For each 50g per day intake of dairy, the risk increased by 12 for liver cancer and 17 percent for breast cancer. Data analyses took into account a range of other factors that can affect cancer risk, including age, sex, family history of cancer
[Neuroscience] Peripheral Blood Circular RNAs could potentially be a new biomarker for Major Depressive Disorder
